manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Delicate and smooth, with no burrs on the feel Select high mountain bamboo, with sturdy and durable wood that is not easy to crack Fine edge sealing Carefully edge sealing, with a delicate and burr free feel, and without warping edges, it is not easy to scratch hands Minimal installation Insert the pillar corresponding to the hole position on the layer board into the installation

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small, light-weight shelf for small, light-weight items
reviews.reviewText: Though advertised as a shoe rack, this is really a somewhat more versatile light-weight shelf. I ordered it as a way to store and organize video game controllers that were previously sitting in a tangle of wires in front of my TV. It would also be suitable for decorative items or pretty much anything that's not too heavy.It's easy to assemble. The shelves are somewhat modular, though given the narrow base and light weight I don't think I'd stack them much higher than 7 shelves in a single unit. (At least, not without finding a way to stabilize the resulting unit.)The materials feel pretty flimsy to me, but being bamboo it probably is stronger than it seems. Nonetheless, I wouldn't use it for storing books or anything very heavy. Still, for either its advertised purpose (shoes) or the purpose for which I bought it, it's a perfectly good storage solution that can fit into a small space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this shoe rack!
reviews.reviewText: I love this shoe rack. It stands tall and holds 7 pairs of shoes. It is easy to set up and move around, but also very sturdy. It is exactly what I was looking for in a shoe rack. Now my room looks more organized, and I can easily access my shoes without them being all over the place or struggling to store them. Very convenient. Get this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Maximize Your Space with Elegance
reviews.reviewText: A game-changer for those grappling with limited space. Its tall and narrow design optimally utilizes vertical space, transforming even the smallest entryways into organized and visually appealing areas. Great sturdy bamboo material. Also, setting it up was a breeze!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very nice design and nice materials
reviews.reviewText: This was surprisingly a very nice set of shelfs.It was very easy to put together. impressed with the materials/bamboo wood that is used. Very light weight yet seems sturdy.Has a very nice small foot print.I would have like to have the flexibility to have them lay sideways but the leg design doesn't give you that option...but other than that, it looks great and is holding all the shoes that were on the floor now...much less tacky in the hallway now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Organizer to go up not out
reviews.reviewText: This bamboo 7-tier shelving unit is well made, it takes a small footprint on the floor and is approx. 10" X 11" X 42". The organizer is versatile as it can store shoes, purses, books, cleaning supplies, towels and much more. It is easy to install with no tools needed; however, some of the legs were missing stain in some areas. At $24 at the time of this writing, it is also priced right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My heels don't fit. Photo shows 7.08 shelf spacingbut that is wrong. 6.70 is the spacing I have. That .38 inchdifference is why most of my heels don't fit. The onesI'm wearing now are only 4.5 inch heels but they don'tfit on the shelves either. I have several pairs of thesein different colors, the reason I ordered this unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice shoe rack.
reviews.reviewText: This was very easy to assemble, the process was self-explanatory, and I didn't even need to look at the instructions. It's a sturdy rack and very lightweight. It holds 6 pairs of shoes (or 7 if you put one on top). It's a very good value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is a simple plug and play assembly, good quality. It is sturdy - not 100 lbs sturdy.1 shelf will fits for 1 adult shoe, or a couple toddler shoes. I get this for the corner in my closet for pants and shirts.It looks really nice, it could be a great addition to anywhere in the house.
